Config¶

Configration Class module

Summary¶

Config()

Class to hold all ACS(Census) settings for the downloader

API Docs¶

class socioFetcher.config.BEA[source]¶

Class to hold all BEA settings for the downloader

API_KEY¶

API key for BEA api

Type

str, required

LINE_CODE¶

Line Code list to download, defalt is ["3"]

Type

list of str

TABLE_NAME¶

Table name to download, default is ["CAINC1"]

Type

list of str

YEAR¶

Years to download, default is ["ALL"]

Type

list of str

GDP_METRO_CODE¶

Metro fips code to download (GDP data only)

Type

dict {metroFipsCode=>metroName}

GDP_COMPONENT¶

GDP component attribute, default is ["RGDP_MAN"]

Type

list of str

GDP_INDUSTRY¶

Industry code to download, default is ["1"] (total)

Type

list of str

GDP_YEAR¶

Year to download for GDP data, default is ["ALL"]

Type

list of str

class socioFetcher.config.BLS[source]¶

Class to hold all BLS settings for the downloader

API_KEY¶

API key for BLS api

Type

str, required

TABLE_NUMBER¶

Table number list to download

Type

list of str

NAICS_CODE_LIST¶

The naics code to download from BLS

Type

dict {naics_code=>naics_name}

DATA_TYPE¶

Data type to download

Type

list of str

SIZE¶

Size category to download

Type

list of str

OWNERSHIP¶

Ownership type to download

Type

list of str

START_YEAR¶

Start year of the query

Type

str

END_YEAR¶

End year of the query

Type

str

class socioFetcher.config.Census[source]¶

Class to hold all ACS(Census) settings for the downloader

API_KEY¶

API key for ACS(Census) api

Type

str, required

YEAR¶

Year list to download ACS data, defualt is ["2010", "2011", "2012", "2013", "2014", "2015", "2016", "2017"]

Type

list of str

SUBJECT_LIST¶
Subject id list to download, default is {

# only available in ACS5 "S0102_C01_036E": "Some college or associate's degree", # only available in ACS5 "S0102_C01_037E": "Bachelor's degree or higher", "S0101_C01_001E": "Total population", "S0102_C01_087E": "Under proverty line", # only available in ACS5

}

Type

dict {SUBJECT_ID=>SUBJECT_NAME}

DETAIL_LIST¶
Detail id list to download, default is {

"C17016_001E": "Total Household", # only in acs1 "C17016_002E": "Household Below poverty level" # only in acs1

}

Type

dict {Detail_ID=>Detail_NAME}

class socioFetcher.config.Global[source]¶

Class to hold all Global settings for the downloader

ALLOWED_DATASET¶

Allowed dataset options supported by this library

Type

list of str

FIPS_CODE¶

Python dictionary with fips code as key and name as values

Type

dict {fipsCode=>Name}
